price: Ô mon peuple ! Entrez dans la terre sainte qu’Allah vous a prescrite. Et ne revenez point sur vos pas [en refusant de combattre] car vous retourneriez perdants.
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسَةَ ٱلَّتِي كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ وَلَا تَرۡتَدُّواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَارِكُمۡ فَتَنقَلِبُواْ خَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāqawmi ud'khulū al-arḍa al-muqadasata allatī kataba al-lahu lakum walā tartaddū ʿalā adbārikum fatanqalibū khāsirīna
